name: The Flower
description:
A Breakout clone I made for the giftjam 2017 to learn Lua and Pico-8 and create a small gift at the same time.

I never really programmed before, so these were intense 24 hours, but totally worth it.

And a big thank-you goes to Krystian from TeamworkCast for his awesome tutorial on Pico-8 I followed to learn and make this:
